mainText:
Hello I'm 11 year's old,

And my family has  2 Apple's computer's, 2 Ipod touch's, 1 Ipod shuffle 
and am Ipod classique and soon to be an IPad 2...Which is my dream to 
have!  My Whole family and I  love Mac and tell all our friends how good 
this software and all of the other things you make are! We say when you go mac you cant go back!

And last I would just like to say how sad we are to know that a genius 
like Steve Jobs has died and that his family has our  condolences with 
them.

Thank you so much for all of your time!
author: Nikola
